steps.conclusion: Some icon choices are slightly mismatched to the course context (e.g., "tabler-engine" for game engine programming, "tabler-device-desktop-analytics" for game production). Also "Game Mathematics" may not be a widely recognized canonical field title.

Use more directly relevant icons (e.g., "tabler-code" for programming, "tabler-chart-bar" for production analytics) and consider renaming "Game Mathematics" to a more standard field like "Mathematical Foundations of Game Development" for clarity.
